title: Reddit Bug Megathread

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! With every new patch Riot introduces to balance out champions and items there are some unforeseen issues that creep up and...

body:
I just found this post on reddit I think it is super well done.

RITOERS take a moment to check this out.

Client responsivness, FPS drops and renekton shitness are the major points on this one.

replies.body:
Hey! 

As LostFrost said, we do check out this thread every patch, and note the issues that are coming in! We try to reply to as many as possible, but aren't able to get to all of them. ;_; Thanks for making sure we see it, though!
lul sorry i had no idea u already watched that post
They already frequent that thread all the time.  If you scroll down you'll see Rioter responses saying some of the bugs are fixed throughout the patch.
